class.name: MediaPipeGraph
class.brief_description: A directed acyclic graph (DAG) of MediaPipe calculator nodes.
class.description: [MediaPipeGraph] provides the functionalities of CalculatorGraph in MediaPipe framework for running the graph.

method.name: add_output_stream_callback
method.description: Adds the packets callback to the output stream [param stream_name]. Returns [code]true[/code] on success. This method can only be called before [method run] or [method start_run].

method.name: add_packet_to_input_stream
method.description: Adds a [param packet] to input stream [param stream_name].

method.name: cancel
method.description: Aborts the graph scheduler if not terminated.

method.name: close_all_input_streams
method.description: Closes all input streams in the graph.

method.name: close_all_packet_sources
method.description: Closes all input streams and source calculator nodes in the graph.

method.name: close_input_stream
method.description: Closes the input stream [param stream_name] in the graph.

method.name: get_gpu_resources
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeGPUResources] of the graph. Returns [code]null[/code] if no GPU resources is set.

method.name: get_output_side_packet
method.description: Gets the output side packet [param packet_name].

method.name: has_error
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the graph has encountered an error.

method.name: has_input_stream
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an input stream [param stream_name] exists in the graph.

method.name: run
method.description: Runs the graph. This method is a blocking call and will return when all calculators are done.

method.name: start_run
method.description: Starts running the graph, returns [code]true[/code] if the graph has started successfully. The graph will continue to run until [method wait_until_done] or [method cancel] is called and returned.

method.name: wait_until_done
method.description: Waits for the current run to finish, all input streams have been closed, and all calculators are stopped. This method can only be called after [method start_run].

method.name: wait_until_idle
method.description: Waits until the running graph is in the idle mode. This method can only be called after [method start_run].

signal.name: error
signal.description: Emitted when the graph has encountered an error.

signal.name: output_stream_callback
signal.description: Emitted when [param stream_name] observed with [method add_output_stream_callback] has emitted a [param packet].
